mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CAFELIST ORDER BY CAFENO DESC
mapper.insert: insert into CAFELIST(CAFENO,CAFENAME, CAFELOCATION, CAFEPRICE, CAFEIMAGE, CAFEMEMBER, CAFELIKE, CAFEINTRO, CAFETEL, CAFETIME) values(0,#{cafeName},#{cafeLocation},#{cafePrice},#{cafeImage},#{cafeMember}, 0, #{cafeIntro} ,#{cafeTel} ,#{cafeTime})
